messages.content:

problems copying from excel files sent thursday problems copy excel files importance high hello again informative excel si copy paste programme portfolio officer sent problems copy excel files importance high hello have problem when trying copy excel file even if file saved into below message appears then file closes cannot paste information need issue solved urgently need finish updating today thank you
